author: Dr15Jones
body: The tests in CMSSW_8_1_DEVEL_X are failing because of an unrunnable schedule when using fastSim with the legacy L1 trigger. Although it would have been possible to fix just that problem, the L1TReco_cff file was not using the modern recommended practice for eras. Therefore I also updated the use of eras.
title: Proper use of eras for L1Reco and a fastSim fix
